subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Sculpture
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
lead_paragraph: Statues, though hardly a new phenomenon at baseball stadiums, are now popping all over the country. Some 70 former players have been immortalized, several this season.
snippet: Statues, though hardly a new phenomenon at baseball stadiums, are now popping all over the country. Some 70 former players have been immortalized, several this season.
